I'm a user like yourself. If I understand your point correctly, the app doesn't make it clear which identity has or was selected when composing or viewing sent mails.

As a suggestion, maybe the developers could enable users to associate a small icon or symbol with each identity. That symbol or icon could be displayed next to the email address in the from address field, as a visual indicator of the identity used. Perhaps you have an idea that makes the identify more prominent.

From my experience, the Thunderbird team have always been open to suggestions and ideas to improve the app. They do like any organisation need to balance priorities, goals and road-maps with resource availability.

The best way to promote your ideas is via Mozilla Connect. https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

This gives us a platform to put forward suggestions and have the community vote for them. The Thunderbird team take these into consideration when reviewing their priorities and road-maps.
